thread.title: Yessenia
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Yessenia

author: Yessenia
title: Yessenia
text: This traffic school was a great value! The cost was very affordable and the customer service was excellent. I sent an email after normal business hours with a question and received and answer that same evening. Communication was polite and helpful. The curriculum was easy to follow and the quizzes prepare you well for the final test. I loved being able to take it in sessions, on my own time.
